title: Mood Tracking Normal Flow
description: Verify that a user can select a mood from the 5-emoji scale, add optional triggers and notes, and submit the check-in successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the Mood Check-in screen
Select an emoji mood from the 5-level scale
Add one or more optional trigger tags
Input a note about the mood
Submit the mood check-in
Verify that the mood, triggers, and notes are saved correctly and visible in mood history

title: Mood Tracking Crisis Keyword Detection
description: Verify that entering mood triggers or notes containing crisis keywords triggers immediate crisis overlay with appropriate options.

steps.description: Navigate to the Mood Check-in screen
Select any emoji mood
Add a note containing a known crisis keyword
Submit the check-in
Verify that a crisis support overlay or modal dialog appears immediately
Verify that user can access SOS breathing exercises and emergency contacts from the overlay

title: Personalized Exercise Recommendation Delivery Within 5 Seconds
description: Verify that after mood check-in, AI-powered personalized CBT exercises are recommended within 5 seconds, including fallback options when AI fails.

steps.description: Complete a mood check-in selecting mood and trigger tags
Verify that a personalized exercise recommendation is displayed within 5 seconds
Simulate AI service failure and verify fallback exercise recommendations are shown

title: Exercise Session Playback and Completion Tracking
description: Verify that users can browse exercises, start audio-visual guided sessions with haptic feedback, pause/resume, and complete exercises with rating submission.

steps.description: Navigate to Exercise Library
Select a breathing or cognitive exercise
Start exercise session and verify audio, visual, and haptic guidance activate
Pause and resume the exercise session
Complete the exercise session
Provide a rating for the exercise
Verify the completion status and rating are saved and reflected in user profile/analytics

title: SOS Crisis Support Activation
description: Verify that the SOS floating button is accessible globally, and on tap instantly activates calming exercises and emergency contact options without UI delays.

steps.description: From any screen, tap the floating SOS crisis button
Verify immediate display of crisis support screen with breathing exercises and emergency resources
Tap emergency contact options and verify correct local/regional contacts are shown
Verify no alert sounds or intrusive notifications are triggered

title: Offline Mode Mood Tracking and Exercise Playback
description: Verify that mood tracking and core exercises function correctly without internet connectivity, and data sync occurs on reconnection with conflict resolution.

steps.description: Disable device internet connectivity
Perform a mood check-in with mood selection, triggers, and notes
Navigate and start offline-supported exercise session
Complete exercise session and rate it
Re-enable device internet connectivity
Verify that offline mood check-in and exercise data synchronize correctly to server with no data loss
Verify local conflict resolution logic is executed if needed

title: Authentication Flow with Google OAuth and Guest Mode
description: Verify secure login using Google OAuth and guest mode login with correct data migration from guest to authenticated sessions.

steps.description: Launch app and login via Google OAuth
Verify successful authentication, session establishment, and data access
Logout and switch to guest mode
Verify anonymous session with limited features enabled
Perform mood check-in and exercise completion under guest mode
Login again via Google OAuth
Verify previous guest data migrates to authenticated account and is retained

title: Notification Delivery and Contextual Therapeutic Messaging
description: Verify notifications are sent as per user preferences with relevant therapeutic content and that smart nudges trigger correctly based on user engagement patterns.

steps.description: Configure notification preferences in settings
Simulate scheduled notification time
Verify receipt of push notification with correct therapeutic tone and content
Simulate missed check-ins or exercise sessions to trigger smart nudges
Verify smart nudge notifications are sent with contextual suggestions

title: Accessibility Compliance Verification
description: Verify that all main screens meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards including screen reader labels, minimum touch targets, contrast ratios, and font scaling.

steps.description: Enable screen reader and navigate through the app screens
Verify all interactive elements have descriptive accessibility labels
Verify all buttons and touch targets meet minimum size requirements
Adjust system font size to large settings
Verify UI adapts correctly without truncation or layout breakage
Check color contrast on all screens using automated tools
Verify contrast meets WCAG AA thresholds

title: Insights & Analytics Accuracy for Mood Trends
description: Verify the insights screen accurately reflects trends, pattern analysis and personalized therapeutic insights based on user mood and exercise data.

steps.description: Complete multiple mood check-ins and exercises over several days
Navigate to the Insights screen
Verify mood trend graphs and analytics match recorded mood data
Verify personalized therapeutic insights update according to recent data

title: Settings Privacy and Data Management Controls
description: Verify users can configure notification, privacy, audio, and accessibility settings and can export or delete their data securely per regulations.

steps.description: Open Settings screen
Modify notification schedules and privacy options
Verify changes are saved and respected on app behavior
Request data export and verify export file is generated with correct user data
Perform data deletion request
Verify user data is removed from local storage and server with confirmation

title: Navigation and UI Consistency with Design System
description: Verify tab-based navigation works smoothly including crisis-first modal screens and that all UI components use the therapeutic color palette, typography, spacing, and animation standards.

steps.description: Navigate between tabs: Home, Exercises, Insights, Settings
Verify transitions are smooth with no freezes or glitches
Trigger crisis modal from mood check or SOS button
Verify crisis modal disables background interaction and uses recommended UI colors and typography
Inspect UI elements on multiple screens for color palette, font styles, spacing, and animations compliance
Verify all UI components follow the app's design system and accessibility standards

title: Data Access Security and Anonymized Analytics
description: Verify that all user data access is restricted to authenticated users only with row-level security and that analytics data aggregated is anonymized.

steps.description: Attempt to access mood data of a different user with manual API requests
Verify access is denied with appropriate error code
Login as a valid user and query user-specific analytics data
Verify data returned corresponds only to logged-in user
Access aggregated analytics for anonymized trends
Verify no personally identifiable information is exposed

title: Performance Under Load and Low-end Devices
description: Verify app performance, memory usage, and responsiveness under load on low-end devices, including device detection and performance optimizations.

steps.description: Run the app on a low-end device or emulator with limited memory and CPU
Perform typical user flows including mood check-in, exercise session, and navigation
Verify app maintains acceptable responsiveness and does not crash
Verify performance optimizations such as memory usage and device-specific tweaks are applied

title: Exception and Error Handling for AI API Failures
description: Verify that AI exercise recommendation API failures are gracefully handled with fallback logic and appropriate user feedback without disrupting app flow.

steps.description: Simulate AI API failure or timeout during personalized exercise recommendation
Verify app falls back to predefined exercise recommendations promptly
Verify user receives non-technical, clear feedback about recommendation availability
Verify no unhandled exceptions or crashes occur
